QuestData.Title: Fly to Silvermoon City
QuestData.Description: $C, for a very modest amount of coin, I can send you swiftly flying through the air on one of these magnificent beasts. And, it's safer than walking there, I can assure you!$B$BWhen you arrive in Silvermoon City, seek out Sathren Azuredawn in the Bazaar.$B$BSpeak with me once more when you've decided you're ready to brave the skies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Purchase a flight to Silvermoon City and deliver Sathiel's Request to Sathren Azuredawn in Silvermoon City.
QuestData.CompletionText: That's quite a list you have there, friend. Let me take a look at it.
QuestData.RewardText: What's this? Sathiel wants all of this!?$B$BDid you bring anyone with you to help take it back?
